root: ^Casper: 'No, we're the only living beings in this house.'
^Casper: 'What I smell...they're remnants. Memories of people who were here.'
^Dylan: "Casper, stay close okay? I think I'm hearing things!"
^Dylan: "I don't remember this place being so creepy. Guess it really has been a while. Let's keep going."
^Dylan: "If this place really is haunted, don't run away without me 'kay?"
